string.text:
A sealed container found on a dead stalker. It must be the shipment Sidorovich was talking about.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item

This PDA confirms Petrenko's missing soldier is dead.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item

A computer encased in a reinforced container. According to the scientists, this is a brand new detector prototype destined to change the world of artefact hunting.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Quest Item

One stalker was supposed to bring me some special supplies from another trader but I haven't heard anything from him for some days. At first I thought he just ran away with the stuff but he hasn't hidden his location and hasn't moved for a while either. Maybe he just lost his PDA? Maybe he's dead. Anyway, I need someone to go there and check what happened. If he died and by chance still has the stuff, bring it back, will ya?.

We are in a bit of a problem right now. One of our teams went out to perform some anomalous scans but hasn't returned yet. We've tried to contact them but we haven't gotten a response. When we brought this up with the State Security Service, they said they can't spare the resources or the manpower to go and find our team right now. One of the team members was equipped with a prototype detector; something we rarely take out of the base to use. If you could go to their last known location and find the prototype or the team, we will pay you for your services. I'll mark the position on your PDA where we lost contact.

Thank god! You do not know how happy I am to see this device back in our hands! Losing the team was saddening but this device would of set back our research by almost a year! Thank you for your help. Here's payment for your services.

Earlier today, a light Duty patrol responded to a distress call from neutrals. They arrived in time to evacuate some stalkers and scientists caught in a major mutant attack, but one of the Dutyers had to stay behind to ensure the escape. The rest of his squad now lists him as missing in action. I'd like you to investigate the site of the attack and confirm his status. If he's alive, heal him as best you can then bring him back. If he cannot be saved, bring back his PDA instead; a martyr's records should be saved for posterity.

He's dead, then? He was a good man, but the Zone can be relentless in its hatred of such people. Here, let me take a look at his PDA... hmm, interesting. On behalf of Duty, you have our gratitude. You've more than earned this payment.
